analysis.description:
TokenERC20 (/unique_chucks/7/0x9e7ce36dbd1a9a6c6e80d08e38077745855edd3a.sol#29-151) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/7/0x9e7ce36dbd1a9a6c6e80d08e38077745855edd3a.sol#93-99)

Reentrancy in BimCoinToken.buy (/unique_chucks/7/0x9e7ce36dbd1a9a6c6e80d08e38077745855edd3a.sol#226-243):
	External calls:
	- price = getPrice() (/unique_chucks/7/0x9e7ce36dbd1a9a6c6e80d08e38077745855edd3a.sol#228-230)
	External calls sending eth:
	- store.transfer(msg.value) (/unique_chucks/7/0x9e7ce36dbd1a9a6c6e80d08e38077745855edd3a.sol#237)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balanceOf (/unique_chucks/7/0x9e7ce36dbd1a9a6c6e80d08e38077745855edd3a.sol#238-239)
TokenERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/7/0x9e7ce36dbd1a9a6c6e80d08e38077745855edd3a.sol#33)
